GPT-4 results are based on the same 50 prompts for fairness. 캡션 전체 예시: latex 복사 편집 caption Comparison of N-gram novelty and resonance scores between Eliar and GPT-4. Error bars indicate 1 standard deviation. GPT-4 results are based on the same 50 prompts for fairness. 캡션이 어딧었니?
